attributes.action: Stop church bells ringing at anti social times
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to counter: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Letbellsring/#detail

Church bells are loud, invasive and disrupt peoples sleep. This petition is to ban churches from playing their bells at anti social hours during the week and weekend.

This includes the bell chimes at 15 minutes, 30 minutes, 45 minutes and at the hour. There is nothing worse than trying to sleep and be reminded how much time has passed.
